abstract: The intangibles of football cannot be measured, but they often are reflected in statistics.
snippet: The intangibles of football cannot be measured, but they often are reflected in statistics.
lead_paragraph: Brian Burke, a former Navy pilot who has taken up the less dangerous hobby of N.F.L. statistical analysis, operates Advanced NFL Stats, a blog about football, math and human behavior.

headline.main: N.F.L. Week 8 Game Probabilities (Intangibles Are Baked In)
